justifications: Starr has backed Britain's decision to quit the European Union, saying Brexit will allow the country to get back on its own feet.
Former Beatles drummer Ringo Starr says that earlier he was a huge fan of the European Union (EU) when it started, but now he supports the Brexit move.
Former Beatles drummer Ringo Starr says that earlier he was a huge fan of the European Union (EU) when it started, but now he supports the Brexit move.
Starr has backed Britain's decision to quit the European Union, saying Brexit will allow the country to get back on its own feet.
